text: 15:2 Aposel 11:30; Galesia 2:1Bizir kam bangɨn, Pol ko Barnabas maburan odorozim me koma a gami. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Kraisɨn adarazi Pol ko Barnabas ko nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Iesusɨn itir gumazir maba sara me amɨsevegha ghaze, me Jerusalemɨn mangɨ bizir kam bagh aposelba ko Siosɨn gumazamizir dapanibav kɨmam.
